name: twitter-backend
description: Microservices-based Twitter backend with API Gateway
author: abdulmoiz-bit

scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:user" "npm run start:tweet"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api-gateway && npm install && cd ../services/auth && npm install && cd ../../services/user && npm install && cd ../../services/tweets && npm install && cd ../..
